mapper.select: select * from ef_center where ef_c_class='11'
mapper.insert: insert into ef_member (ef_id, ef_pwd, ef_name, ef_p_number, ef_email, ef_c_name, ef_class) values (#{ef_id}, #{ef_pwd}, #{ef_name}, #{ef_p_number}, #{ef_email}, #{ef_c_name}, #{ef_class})
mapper.update: update ef_member set ef_class = (select decode(ef_class, '02', '12', '03', '13') from ef_member where ef_id = #{ef_id}) where ef_id = #{ef_id}
mapper.select: select mem.ef_id, mem.ef_name, mem.ef_p_number, mem.ef_email, regi.ef_count, (case when (to_date(regi.ef_start_term)-to_date(sysdate)) > 0 then (to_date(regi.ef_end_term)-to_date(regi.ef_start_term)) else (to_date(regi.ef_end_term)-to_date(sysdate)) end) as ef_term, regi.ef_start_term, regi.ef_end_term, regi.ef_p_type from ef_member mem join ef_m_regi regi on mem.ef_id = regi.ef_id where mem.ef_c_name = #{ef_c_name} and mem.ef_class='13'
select * from ef_m_regi where ef_id = #{ef_id}
mapper.insert: insert into ef_record (ef_id, ef_r_count, ef_start_term, ef_end_term, ef_p_type, ef_detail) values (#{ef_id}, #{ef_r_count}, #{ef_start_term}, #{ef_end_term}, #{ef_p_type}, #{ef_detail})
mapper.select: select ef_p_date, ef_p_time from ef_pt where ef_id = #{ef_id} and ef_p_date >= sysdate order by ef_p_date, ef_p_time
select * from ef_pt where ef_id = #{ef_id} and ef_p_date >= sysdate-1 order by ef_p_date, ef_p_time
select * from ef_pt where ef_id = #{ef_id} and ef_p_date < sysdate order by ef_p_date, ef_p_time

select pt.ef_p_no, pt.ef_p_type, pt.ef_name, pt.ef_p_date, pt.ef_p_time, pt.ef_p_personal, pt.ef_r_personal from ef_pt pt join reservation re on pt.ef_p_no = re.ef_p_no where re.ef_id = #{ef_id} and pt.ef_p_date >= sysdate-1 order by pt.ef_p_date, pt.ef_p_time

mapper.select: select * from ef_pt where ef_c_name = #{ef_c_name} order by ef_p_date, ef_p_time
mapper.insert: insert into reservation (ef_p_no, ef_id, ef_name, ef_p_number) values (#{ef_p_no}, #{ef_id}, #{ef_name}, #{ef_p_number})

update ef_m_regi set ef_count = ef_count - 1 where ef_id = #{ef_id} and ef_count > 0
